Bandcamp Dance Librarian - Admin



Add another electornic dance music bandcamp label/library to the database.

The library should contain at least 100 tracks to be listed on the main page.

The algorithm will process the tracks individually and extract their audio features.

You can also add a pre-existing library for updating it with recently released tracks.

https://.bandcamp.com

{{ warning_message }}

Download the tracks database in CSV format.

Download the shortlist of labels with the number of tracks processed in CSV format.
